# GitHub Topics for This Repository

To make this repository more discoverable on GitHub, add these topics in the repository settings:

## Recommended Topics

### Primary Topics
- `machine-learning`
- `xgboost`
- `lightgbm`
- `deep-learning`
- `pytorch`
- `kan-network`
- `house-price-prediction`
- `regression`
- `data-science`
- `python`

### Secondary Topics
- `optuna`
- `hyperparameter-optimization`
- `feature-engineering`
- `data-preprocessing`
- `kaggle`
- `ames-housing`
- `gradient-boosting`
- `neural-networks`
- `scikit-learn`
- `pandas`

### Technology Topics
- `python3`
- `jupyter-notebook`
- `matplotlib`
- `seaborn`
- `yellowbrick`

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

This will help your repository appear in more searches and recommendations!
